analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol:
	Contract LCXCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#208-210)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

LCXCoin.bountyFund should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#88-90)
LCXCoin.charityFund should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#87-88)
LCXCoin.tradingFund should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#90-91)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#59-61) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of LCXCoin._transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#126) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of LCXCoin._transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#126) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of LCXCoin._transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#127) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of LCXCoin.burn (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#217-218) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of LCXCoin.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#226-227) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of LCXCoin.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/12/0xa846bdd058d9ef4cf472ecb10a46639a1114a161.sol#227) is not in mixedCase
